attributes.action: Make Mortgage Lenders Treat Customers Fairly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we the tax payer are now part owners of the big banks perhaps you could enforce them help the customers that they choose to lend 125% Mortgage and will not transfer them onto to a new rate but tell them to find a new lender. How? Repossessions are up but they are not offering any help to these people. Northern Rock have been taken over by the Government and yet they are not helping the old customers just the new. Come on its tough times help these people

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence:  http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Mortgage-Crisis/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
